content: Hey Nguyễn, thanks for reaching out!`slimReduxReact()` actually does return a HOC that makes sure to pass on the props it gets to the wrapped component (the “component” property of the argument in silmReduxReact()):https://github.com/aGuyNamedJonas/slim-redux-react/blob/master/src/slimReduxReact.js#L75 And here’s where the HOC gets returned:https://github.com/aGuyNamedJonas/slim-redux-react/blob/master/src/slimReduxReact.js#L85 I never used recompose before, so I don’t know where you might run into problems with that, but if you have any more questions let me know! :)
